message: Happy Birthday, my sweetheart!
I hope your day is as wonderful in every way as you are 😊
You are quite a cutie 😘
🕺 I enjoy dancing with you so much 💃
I can't wait until we get a chance to dance together again
I love you, Shortcake 🍰
You're always extremely loving 🥰
The love I give you is a reflection
You're smarter than you give yourself credit
You've got such a big heart 💓
And have got a hold of mine 🫀
I love you so much because your personality 💖
But 🍈🍈 are always a welcome bonus 😉
Don't let a number define you
You're youthful as ever in your body and in your soul 🌞
Not only are you so loving to me
You're also loved right back by me 😍
🦆 Mep mep mep 🦆
Roses can be white, so can a tulip
Legitimate question: How are your birthday flowers holding ip? 💐
I long always to feel the soft touch of your skin on mine
💡 Remember to get a new headlight for your car
I couldn't have dreamt of meeting someone as wonderful as you, Sam
I'm grateful to have you in my life 🙂
Tommy Boy, your favorite movie! 🤣
<q>You can get a good look at a butcher's ass by sticking your head up there. But, wouldn't you rather take his word for it?</q>
Your silky skin and hair are often in my thoughts
Even smoother than all your soft clothes and blankets
Your long, black, curly hair and dark brown eyes make my heart skip a beat every time
You're my one true love, April 😘
Great personality, great looks, great memories, ...
You're great all around 🤩
I think of you often, during all parts of the day 💭
Remembering all the great times we've had together
And imagining the even greater ones to come
You've been my first (😉) for quite a few things
Thank you for showing me so many new experiences 😙
Approche toi de moi
Monte le son plus fort
Je veux sentir <s>une dernière fois</s> encore une fois ton corps contre moi
I never want to stop flirting with you 😘
No matter how long we've been together
The subtle winks and suggestive comments never get old

solutions.__comment: For the day Sam is driving to Orlando: Thurs April 7
message: Have a safe drive, my love 🏎
I'm so excited to be in your arms again 🤗
Your soft skin shines in the sun
Your bright spirit shines in all weather
(And thank you for the sexy Shinesty undergarments, both of ours)

solutions.__comment: I may have forgotten to put in more solutions for the event weekend, so these were repeated
message: Happy Birthday, my sweetheart!
I hope your day is as wonderful in every way as you are 😊
You are quite a cutie 😘
🕺 I enjoy dancing with you so much 💃
I can't wait until we get a chance to dance together again
I really enjoyed my time at the hotel with you 🏩
With no one else around, we didn't have to worry about being quiet ❤️‍🔥
The soft, thin dresses are my favorite clothes of yours 👗
They're smooth like your skin, they show plenty of shoulder, have easy access to your legs
You're sweet like honey 🍯
(Fuck bees 🐝 though)
There's no better way to start my day than feeling you next to me when I awake
I always cherish these mornings 🌞
You're a great catch, sweetie 🎣
I hate to see you leave
But love to watch you walk away
Have a safe trip home sweetie
This separation will be a quick one, my dear
See you again soon 😗
I hope your skin is done being itchy finally
I saw how much that annoyed and bothered you
Now that you've worked a couple days and made some money 💰
Time for another vacation

See you in NOLA 📿
Thank you for playing chess with me
And making me play with the NOLA people ;)
I really enjoy giving you goose bumps ;)
(But not when the cold gives them to you; try and keep warm)
The feeling when you say <q>goodbye</q>...
Hurts Donut? 🍩

solutions.__comment: Try to put on April 25, Samdle 41
message: It's been seven months since we've been together
These seven months have been the best in my life, without a doubt
Looking forward to many more 💖
I very much enjoy going on trips with you!
Hopefully one of these international ones will happen soon 🛫
You wanted this one the other day
So I'm gonna give it to you 😏
Remember to drink plenty of water 💧
Still remember to drink plenty water 💧💧

I always love getting another one from you 🎶
And I always love you 💞
I'm glad the movie last night was good 🎬
Something to take your mind off all the moving-related happenings
I'm truly super excited about you moving down south to Orlando!
And to be moving into the next chapter of your life with you
Thanks for the memory of cubing with you on me
One more little thing to remind me of you 💭🍆
(Not that I need it)
We make a great pair of cooks 👩‍🍳👨‍🍳
I've really enjoyed cooking with you (in person and in spirit)
Sorry for all the Samdle fails 😬
It's getting harder and harder to come up with five-letter words 😆
You're so brave for committing to move to Orlando!
It will be great once you move here; I'm counting down the days 😁
All the Zillow houses you send me make me thing of how wonderful it would be to live with you 😍
The ducks can't wait to see you more often 🦆
(And me too 😍)
Being naked with you is a pleasure all around
For my eyes, my skin, my heart, and my genitals
<q>BEAUTY</q> is better, but I'm not giving into the 6-letter words just yet
In any case, you're beautiful and a beaut
TITTIES!
Need I say more?
Now that we've found out what happens in our books 📖
We can think how to cash in out winnings from the sexy bets 😏

See you soon, gorgeous 😍
I hope the towel whipping isn't too much
It's all in a loving manner 😜
(And always feel free to hit me back)
It's packing-things-into-boxes week now 📦
So close to you moving to Orlando!
Je t'aime, mon amour ❤
I love your beautiful smile 😁
You being happy makes me happy ❤
Looking forward to going to the beach with you more in Orlando 🏖
Did it hurt when you fell from heaven?
It's finally happening! We'll live close to each other for the first time in over 10 months!
It will be and amazing next segment of your life!
